commitMessage:
Implement Dark Mode Only: Enforce consistent dark theme across all environments

- Add 'dark' class to HTML element in layout.tsx for Tailwind dark mode
- Simplify CSS variables in globals.css to use only dark mode values
- Remove redundant body styles that caused conflicts between light/dark modes
- Remove darkMode config from tailwind.config.ts (no longer needed)
- Fixes white background issue on different VMs/browsers
- Ensures robust dark-only display regardless of system preferences
author: root

commitMessage:
Fix PlayerDetailModal accessibility: Add proper Dialog.Title and Dialog.Description

- Move Dialog.Title to be direct child of Dialog.Content for Radix UI compliance
- Add Dialog.Description for better accessibility
- Use sr-only class to hide accessibility elements visually
- Convert nested Dialog.Title to regular h2 element
- Fixes console warning about missing DialogTitle
author: root

commitMessage:
Fix hydration error and implement mobile left-to-right bar filling

- Fix RefreshButton hydration error by implementing client-side localStorage access
- Add isClient state to prevent server/client rendering mismatch
- Modify PlayerMatchHistory mobile view for left-to-right bar filling
- Keep desktop view unchanged with bottom-to-top filling
- Update CSS masks and positioning for responsive bar behavior
author: root
